alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:02PM EDT until June 17 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lumpkin County in north central Georgia... Gilmer County in north central Georgia... Northwestern White County in northeastern Georgia... Dawson County in north central Georgia... Pickens County in north central Georgia... Central Union County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Fannin County in north central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hemp to near Pisgah to near Roundtop, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Dawsonville, Ellijay, Nelson, East Ellijay, Morganton, Talking Rock, Suches, Amicalola Falls State Park, Jones Creek, Fausett Lake, Pisgah, Cherry Log, Tate, Stover Creek Shelter, Hemp, Margret, Camp Merrill and Whitley Gap Shelter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union; White
